description.overview: Overall represents the combined energy and quality of all life areas today.
description.detailed: This aggregates all 17 meters (Mind, Emotions, Body, Spirit, and Growth groups) to show the big picture of your day. The overall score shows how much astrological activity is affecting you, while harmony indicates whether that activity is supportive or challenging. This gives you an at-a-glance sense of today's energy before diving into specific areas.

quiet.challenging: Minimal cosmic activity but what's present is challenging - rest and restore
quiet.mixed: Very subtle energy - quiet but present
quiet.harmonious: Peaceful day with minimal cosmic activity - deep rest

mild.challenging: Light challenges across life areas - manageable obstacles
mild.mixed: Gentle mix of support and challenge - both present
mild.harmonious: Easy flowing day - light cosmic support

moderate.challenging: Active challenges requiring attention - push through resistance
moderate.mixed: Moderate activity in all directions - complexity to navigate
moderate.harmonious: Steady cosmic support - good momentum across areas

high.challenging: Intense cosmic pressure - major challenges demanding response
high.mixed: High activity with mixed quality - exciting and difficult simultaneously
high.harmonious: Strong favorable energy - exceptional day for action

extreme.challenging: Maximum cosmic intensity with difficult quality - major breakthrough required
extreme.mixed: Extreme activity in all directions - total chaos and opportunity
extreme.harmonious: Peak cosmic alignment - exceptional support across all areas
